name: Steve and Dave's Grassland Adventures
description:
Steve and Dave's Grassland Adventure is a side-scroller RPG game set in Australia, Melbourne. Due to the city's massive population in vegan shops and the random appearance of chemical Z, every vegan lover's organs have turned into vegetables, turning all vegans into zombies. Dave and Steve, two brothers who never touched anything but meat in their life have decided to save the day! Using their love of meat, they have made it to Melbourne to beat back the meat into the vegan zombies and save the world.

Although the tutorial teaches you how to play the game, here are the controls:

  • Move: Left and Right arrow keys
  • Attack: A, S or D (S and D will be future keys for new attacks)
  • Left Shift: Swap between character
  • Menu Selection: A
  • Closing Game: Alt-Tab then close (forgot to add)

This game was made by Ben Nilsson (KotieMakesGames) and Oliver Parrish. You can find us on:

Ben (programming, enemy/character design and animation):

  • Twitter: @KotieYT
  • Twitch: KotieMakesGames

Oliver (art and level design):

  • Twitter: @xSpaceMonkeeyx

The current version (version v.1) was made for KrassJam7. This means that the current state of the game has been worked on for only 72-hours. This is not the final version of the game and has missing features.
